name: Space Dodge
overview: Space Dodge is a simple game developed in BASIC by Gary Wilson. It was published as a type-in by Fontana Paperbacks in 1984 in the book "Giant Book of Games for Your Commodore 64." You play the spaceship on top of the screen, your goal is to avoid all the asteroids coming up the screen by pressing J (left) and K (right) on the keyboard.
